void cc1000_tdma_init (uint8_t id)

Detailed Description

Driver provides: use of cc1000 radio with a simple TDMA MAC.

Driver requires: AVR architecture with cc1000 connected via SPI bus.

Author:
Brian Shucker
Date:
03/18/2004
